newsitem.title: USA: Thomson sets internet-via-TV by spring '97.
newsitem.headline: Thomson sets internet-via-TV by spring '97.

text.p: Thomson Consumer Electronics, a unit of Thomson SA, Wednesday said it plans to introduce in the spring a television set-top device that will enable consumers to use their set to surf the Internet.
The device will be based on Oracle Corp unit Network Computer Inc's reference design and will easily connect to a standard color TV, Thomson said.
Consumer ease of use will be assured by Thomson's relationship with Net Channel Inc, the program and services provider, available on a subscription fee basis, Thomson said.
Details on the terms of the Thomson's relationship with Net Channel were not disclosed.
